1.0.name: wordpress/wp-post-navigation
1.0.description: WP Post Navigation Plugin gives you facility to show Previous and Next Post Links at the Top or Bottom of a Post. You've the option to set Post Navigation Bar at Bottom, Top or both Top & Bottom. You can apply CSS style to Previous and Next Post Links. You can set custom text instead of Next and Previous Post Titles. You can set custom Image for Next and Previous Post Links.
